price: Enti (nnipa), mo mmͻeε na εyε den anaasε ͻsoro? Ɔno na Ɔbͻeε,
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: a-antum ashaddu khalqan ami al-samāu banāhā
